Key Match Events: The game was a pitchers' duel with both teams performing well defensively.
Zack Wheeler pitched seven scoreless innings, extending the Phillies' winning streak to 31 when their starter completes seven innings.
Post-Match Reflections: Phillies manager Rob Thomson praised Wheeler's performance and locked-in command.
Nick Castellanos highlighted Wheeler's consistency and effectiveness.
Zack Wheeler expressed pride in his performance and the team's resilience.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wheeler has a remarkable 2.07 ERA against the Braves since joining the Phillies in 2020.
The Cy Young Award race between Wheeler and Chris Sale is closely contested.
Others: Wheeler's performance against the Braves is a historical point, and his rivalry with the team adds context.
